description._content: Returns the list of public groups a user is a member of.

response._content:
<groups>
	<group nsid="34427469792@N01" name="FlickrCentral"
		admin="0" eighteenplus="0" invitation_only="0" /> 
	<group nsid="37114057624@N01" name="Cal's Test Group"
		admin="1" eighteenplus="0" invitation_only="1" /> 
	<group nsid="34955637532@N01" name="18+ Group"
		admin="1" eighteenplus="1" invitation_only="0" /> 
</groups>

explanation._content: The admin attribute indicates whether the user is an administrator of the group. The eighteenplus attribute indicates if the group is visible to members over 18 only. The invite_only attribute indicates whether a user can join the group without administrator approval.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: user_id
argument._content: The NSID of the user to fetch groups for.

argument.name: invitation_only
argument._content: Include public groups that require an invitation or administrator approval to join.
